name: Sinan Yilmaz
bio: I recently graduated from the General Assembly Software Engineering Bootcamp in June 2024, after making a successful transition to the United States in June 2022. I have a deep passion for learning new things and always strive to do my best. Creating new things has always fascinated me, it brings me happiness and a sense of pride. With the background in the restaurant business, I have strong communication abilities, management for team-work and problem-solving skills. I am eager to enter this field to showcase my abilities and learn more.
